SELECT * FROM iam_permission ip WHERE ip.public_access = 0 AND ip.login_access = 0
AND ip.code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{permissionDO.code}), '%')
AND ip.fd_level = #{permissionDO.level}
AND ip.fd_resource LIKE concat(concat('%',#{permissionDO.resource}), '%')
AND ip.service_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{permissionDO.serviceName}), '%')
AND( ip.code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}), '%') OR ip.description LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}), '%') )

SELECT iam_permission.* FROM iam_role_permission INNER JOIN iam_permission ON iam_role_permission.permission_id = iam_permission.id WHERE iam_role_permission.role_id = #{roleId}
AND ( iam_permission.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params), '%') OR iam_permission.description LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params), '%') )

SELECT ip.* FROM iam_role ir INNER JOIN iam_role_permission irp ON ir.id = irp.role_id INNER JOIN iam_permission ip ON irp.permission_id = ip.id WHERE ir.id = #{role.id} AND ir.fd_level != ip.fd_level
